scripts.cucumber:e2e:test: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require step-definitions --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --publish-quiet
scripts.cucumber:e2e:browserstack: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require nightwatch.browserstack.conf.js --require step-definitions --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --publish-quiet
